data.name: Tactical Operations Centre 1.5 HD
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
Requires Revolution 1.5+
This is the Epsilon class carrier mid-life extension program phase 2.
The RADAR screen and some of the bridge consoles have been updated to a higher resolution.
Bridge gains a basic HUD for the Helm position showing compass course and island info. Swapped positions of aft CIWS and torpedo launchers to give greater coverage.
Retained the 1.4, 3x operator tactical operations room down in the upper hangar bay. There are 3 operator stations, 2 loadout stations and two information screens as well as flight ops overview/docking info.
Includes Captain's controls and 4th bridge terminal by Mr Scoot.
Also adds a 4-cell laser-missile VLS if used with Revolution 1.3.11+ Provides the auto-barge slot for use with Resupply+ and Revolution 1.5+
